name: EvenMoreLevelTags
description: Adds even more level tags based on a level's traits.

robsVault.name: Enable for RobsVault
robsVault.description:
Show level tags on levels under the RobsVault account.

<cp>This is</c> <cr>NOT <cp>recommended,</c> <cy>as levels under the RobsVault account name will show EVERY level tag regardless of the level's traits.</c>

shaderAbuseTolerance.name: Shader Trigger Tolerance
shaderAbuseTolerance.description:
Adjust how many shader triggers <co>(regardless of type)</c> need to be included in a level in order to show the shader trigger (in)tolerance tag.

<cl>You can set this to a negative number to disable the tag entirely.</c>

advancedShaderAbuseTolerance.name: Advanced Shader Trigger Tolerance Counter
advancedShaderAbuseTolerance.description:
When determining if a level should display the <cl>shader trigger (in)tolerance tag</c>, use the <co>total number</c> <cl>of shader triggers</c> used in a level <cy>[Example: 3 Grayscale, 28 Shock Wave, 10 Sepia]</c> instead of the <co>total types</c> <cl>of shader triggers</c> used in a level <cy>[Example: Grayscale, Shock Wave, Sepia]</c>.

<cy>Detecting this information takes a</c> <cr>REALLY</c> <cy>long time on larger levels such as</c> <cl>EverAfter by Galofuf</c><cy>, so enabling this is</c> <cr>HIGHLY DISCOURAGED</c><cy>.</c>

cameraAbuseTolerance.name: Camera Trigger Tolerance
cameraAbuseTolerance.description:
Adjust how many camera triggers <co>(regardless of type)</c> need to be included in a level in order to show the camera trigger (in)tolerance tag.

<cl>You can set this to a negative number to disable the tag entirely.</c>

advancedCameraAbuseTolerance.name: Advanced Camera Trigger Tolerance Counter
advancedCameraAbuseTolerance.description:
When determining if a level should display the <cl>camera trigger (in)tolerance tag</c>, use the <co>total number</c> <cl>of camera triggers</c> used in a level <cy>[Example: 32 Static, 878 Rotate, 95 Zoom]</c> instead of the <co>total types</c> <cl>of shader triggers</c> used in a level <cy>[Example: Static, Rotate, Zoom]</c>.

<cy>Detecting this information takes a</c> <cr>REALLY</c> <cy>long time on larger levels such as</c> <cl>EverAfter by Galofuf</c><cy>, so enabling this is</c> <cr>HIGHLY DISCOURAGED</c><cy>.</c>

issues.info: Ping me <cl>(@erymanthus)</c> in the Geode SDK Discord server's <cl>#help</c> channel if you need help. <cr>DMs are NOT accepted.</c>
